Package Models

Class PlayerBehaviorStrategy

java.lang.Object
Models.PlayerBehaviorStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AggressivePlayer, BenevolentPlayer, CheaterPlayer, HumanPlayer, RandomPlayer
public abstract class PlayerBehaviorStrategy extends Object implements Serializable
This is Player Behavior's abstract strategy class.
Version:
3.0.0
Author:
Sumit Sharma, Muhammad Adnan Asad, Pranaykumar Chauhan, Darshansinh Dilipsinh Devda, Dhruvkumar Parmar, Dhruv Patel
